chunk:
Biossance Squalane + Antioxidant Cleansing Oil

Brand: Biossance

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-2 Caprate, Squalane, C13-15 Alkane, Polyglyceryl-2 Sesquioleate, Triethylhexanoin, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Rosa Moschata Seed, Oil, Avena Sativa (Oa

il, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Oenothera Biennis, (Evening Primrose) Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary), Leaf Extract, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Helianthus, Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol

Directions: Dispense 3-4 pumps of cleansing oil into dry hands and gently massage over dry

ly massage over dry face. Emulsify with water until it turns into a light milky lather. Rinse skin thoroughly with water.

Warnings: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Cancer, Use Restrictions; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
